summary: view.getProjection() instance only valid during a specific view

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? getProjection() returns null when nothing is drawn yet. I would like to have a valid reference that is usable as after a viewport on the map is established. getProject() needs to be called after view changes and an old reference is invalid. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? osmdroid-1.08.jar Please provide any additional information below.
